cobblegen.name: CobbleGen
cobblegen.desc: This guide will teach you how to make a cobble stone generator that you can use when playing skyblock.
steps: Dig a Trench that looks like the one shown, you should dig out the blocks marked in red.
Add water to the block marked in blue. It should fall into the hole.
Add lava to the far side of the trench, and the water and lava should cool into stone. Once you break the stone, more stone should come back in the exact same spot.

Once your cobblestone generator is ready, you can mine away and mine away, and you'll never run out of cobble. Dig yourself a little hole to stand in, and watch as all your skyblock goals are achieved. Enjoy!
useful: Click Obsidian with a bucket to get lava back!

elevators.name: Elevators
elevators.desc: Simple Elevators provides very simple and easy to use elevators. Using Space to go one floor up, and Shift to go one floor down. It's that Simple!
steps: You can use any combination of the blocks above
